I think you might really enjoy "Flags of Our Fathers"! Not only is it a powerful war drama, but it also features some amazing performances from its talented cast, including Stark Sands and Barry Pepper. The film's gripping story will have you on the edge of your seat as you follow the lives of the six men who raised the flag at the Battle of Iwo Jima.

If you're looking for something a bit more offbeat, "Man on Wire" might be just what you need! This documentary is an incredible true story about Philippe Petit's daring high-wire walk between the World Trade Center towers. And, of course, it features Jean-Louis Blondeau and Paul McGill, both of whom are fascinating to watch.
